mapper.select: SELECT bno FROM tblresume WHERE EXISTS (SELECT bno FROM tblresume WHERE userid=#{id} and publicornot='공개') AND userid=#{id} and publicornot='공개';

select bno, title, cid , (select jobgroup from tbljobgroup where id=rc.jobgroupid ) as v1 , (select jobgroup from tbljobgroup where id=rc.jobgroupid2 ) as v2 , (select rgbname from tblregion where rgbid=rc.rgbid AND rgsid=rc.rgsid ) as w1 , (select rgsname from tblregion where rgbid=rc.rgbid AND rgsid=rc.rgsid ) as w2 , (select career from tblcode where id=rc.employstatusid ) as x , (select career from tblcode where id=rc.edu ) as y , (select career from tblcode where id=rc.exp ) as z from tblrecruit rc where bno = #{bno};

select bno, title, cid , (select jobgroup from tbljobgroup where id=rc.jobgroupid ) as v1 , (select jobgroup from tbljobgroup where id=rc.jobgroupid2 ) as v2 , (select rgbname from tblregion where rgbid=rc.rgbid AND rgsid=rc.rgsid ) as w1 , (select rgsname from tblregion where rgbid=rc.rgbid AND rgsid=rc.rgsid ) as w2 , (select career from tblcode where id=rc.employstatusid ) as x , (select career from tblcode where id=rc.edu ) as y , (select career from tblcode where id=rc.exp ) as z ,(select cname from tblcinfo where id=rc.cid) as cname , (select periodstart from tblrecruit where bno = rc.bno) as periodstart , (select period from tblrecruit where bno = rc.bno) as period , (select count(*) from tblapply where rcno = rc.bno) as acceptmethod , ( select count(*) from tblinterestjob where userid=#{pid} and rcbno=#{bno}) as adddesc
from tblrecruit rc where bno = #{bno};

select bno, title , (select jobgroup from tbljobgroup where id=re.jobgroupid ) as v1 , (select jobgroup from tbljobgroup where id=re.jobgroupid2 ) as v2 , (select rgbname from tblregion where rgbid=re.rgbid AND rgsid=re.rgsid ) as w1 , (select rgsname from tblregion where rgbid=re.rgbid AND rgsid=re.rgsid ) as w2 , (select career from tblcode where id=re.employstatusid ) as x , (select career from tblcode where id=re.levelofeducation ) as y , (select career from tblcode where id=re.lastcareer ) as z from tblresume re where bno = #{bno};

select distinct rc.bno as bno, rc.cid, rc.title ,SQRT( POW(((select z from tblcode where id=re.lastcareer)-(select z from tblcode where id=rc.exp))*10,2) * (user.pref_lastcareer *20) + POW(((select y from tblcode where id=re.levelofeducation)-(select y from tblcode where id=rc.edu))*10,2) * (user.pref_levelofeducation *20) + POW(((select x from tblcode where id=re.employstatusid)-(select x from tblcode where id=rc.employstatusid))*10,2) * (user.pref_employstatus *20) + case when (re.jobgroupid2=rc.jobgroupid2) then 0 when (re.jobgroupid=rc.jobgroupid) then 1 else (POW((select v1 from tbljobgroup where id=re.jobgroupid2)-(select v1 from tbljobgroup where id=rc.jobgroupid2),2) +POW((select v2 from tbljobgroup where id=re.jobgroupid2)-(select v2 from tbljobgroup where id=rc.jobgroupid2),2)) *10 * (user.pref_job *20) end + case when (re.rgbid=rc.rgbid AND re.rgsid=rc.rgsid) then 0 when (re.rgbid=rc.rgbid) then 1 else (POW((select w1 from tblregion where rgbid=re.rgbid and rgsid=re.rgsid)-(select w1 from tblregion where rgbid=rc.rgbid and rgsid=rc.rgsid),2) +POW((select w2 from tblregion where rgbid=re.rgbid and rgsid=re.rgsid)-(select w2 from tblregion where rgbid=rc.rgbid and rgsid=rc.rgsid),2)) *600 * (user.pref_region *20) end ) as distance from tblresume re, tblrecruit rc, tbluser user where re.bno=#{bno} and user.id=#{userid} and rc.state=1 order by distance asc limit 10 ;
